member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_DESC
member.summary: Describes a video stream for a Microsoft Direct3D 11 video decoder or video processor.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_DESC.Guid
member.summary: The decoding profile. To get the list of profiles supported by the device, call the method.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_DESC.SampleWidth
member.summary: The width of the video frame, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_DESC.SampleHeight
member.summary: The height of the video frame, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_DESC.OutputFormat
member.summary: The output surface format, specified as a value.
